# privx_password_policy (Data Source)

Lookup a PrivX password policy by id or name.

## Example Usage

```terraform
data "privx_password_policy" "default" {
  name = "Default Password Policy"
}
```

<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->
## Schema

### Optional

- `id` (String) Password policy ID. If set, lookup is done by ID.
- `name` (String) Password policy name. If set, lookup is done by name.
